ISSUE.TITLE: Issue with @await syntax in cshtml files
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi there is a problem with "@await something" in cshtml files There should be "@(await something)" this [PR](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/pull/6968) fixes this issue

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix @await syntax in cshtml files related to #6969
